column5: We found a good website for kids games. Mostly for girls but lots there for boys too.  http://www.games2girls.com/
Thanks SlowPoke, just added it to my 7yr old daughter's favourites.
No problem Jedi!!! We find it so hard to find safe content for the kids, just wanted to share. -Brian
Hey that's not fair................what if you don't have a little girl?  LOL   Regards, Sam
http://www.addictinggames.com/hidethefart.html My high score is 4300  ***EDIT*** New high score 21180... my wife will be so proud.
Thanks Slowpoke! I sent Hide the fart to my daughter! She`s 31.
Brian thanks for that!!!!! Awesome!  G
